name: Knight of Lothric
description: You are a celebrated knight of Lothric. As the sun grew darker and darker, you too had succumbed to the Undead Curse. Overtime you witnessed the Age of Fire start to plunge into the Deep with what sanity you had left. Be it a Miracle of the gods or magic gone awry, you awaken with your Humanity restored in another land that feels alien and yet so familiar...

name: Knight of Lothric
description: You were cast out after you had trainied to be one of Farron's Undead Legion. Regardless of your talent, you were deemed unfit to partake in the Blood of the Wolf and then sent to seek your purpose. However, they were not overly cruel, you were allowed to keep your own equipment and this strange new world has given you back your humanity. Can you keep it?.
